p: Cannabinoids are active compounds of Cannabis sativa and C. indica. The docking score of nabiximols (a combination of cannabidiol and tetrahydrocannabinol) against M pro and S protein was −8 and −10.2, respectively. Besides being known as an antiherpes simplex virus [ 28], this compound also has anti-inflammatory activity [ 119]. However, some research studies show that this compound can increase the virus's pathogenesis to the host [ 119– 121].
